summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PropTech Decision Copilot MCP integration and premium dark UI upgrade. All backend APIs functional, MCP endpoints working perfectly with 5 JSON-RPC tools, premium dark UI implemented with glassmorphism effects, no theme toggle found (dark-only confirmed).

design_issues.issue: Chart width/height showing as -1 in console warnings

passed_tests: MCP tools/list returns all 5 tools - POST /api/mcp
MCP list_properties returns markdown formatted properties
Login page renders with premium dark UI and glassmorphism
Dashboard loads with glassmorphism cards and gradient text
No theme toggle button visible (dark mode only)
All KPI cards present with premium styling
User menu dropdown with glassmorphism styling
Page navigation working between all sections
